Summary._: [A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Broad Channel.

Description._:
[A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Broad Channel.

Our crews are on scene working to fix it as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated.

LongDescription:
[A] and [S]-Rockaway Park shuttle trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Broad Channel.
Our crews are on scene working to fix it as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated.

Summary._: Southbound [Q] trains are running express from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy because of a sick passenger at Church Av.

Description._:
Southbound [Q] trains are running express from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy because of a sick passenger at Church Av.

Expect delays on the [B] and [Q] trains.

Summary._: [F] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a train with mechanical problems at Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.

Description._: [F] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a train with mechanical problems at Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.

LongDescription: [F] train service has resumed following an earlier incident involving a train with mechanical problems at Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.
